statements: SELECT * FROM health_insurance_claims WHERE member_id = 12345;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM health_insurance_claims WHERE diagnosis_code = 'C123';
SELECT * FROM health_insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT claim_date, diagnosis_code FROM health_insurance_claims WHERE member_id = 54321;
SELECT member_id, claim_amount FROM health_insurance_claims WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM health_insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT claim_id, member_id, claim_amount FROM health_insurance_claims WHERE diagnosis_code = 'H123' ORDER BY member_id ASC
SELECT claim_id, member_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM health_insurance_claims WHERE diagnosis_code LIKE 'C%' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC
SELECT claim_id, member_id, claim_amount, diagnosis_code FROM health_insurance_claims WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY member_id ASC, claim_date DESC
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, count(*) AS num_claims FROM health_insurance_claims GROUP BY claim_id, claim_amount HAVING num_claims > 1 ORDER BY num_claims DESC
SELECT * FROM insurer_claims;
SELECT policy_number, claim_amount FROM insurer_claims WHERE claim_date = '2021-09-12';
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_description FROM fraud_patterns WHERE fraud_level > 3 ORDER BY detected_date DESC;
SELECT claim_amount FROM insurer_claims WHERE policy_number = 12345 ORDER BY claim_date ASC;
SELECT pattern_description, fraud_level FROM fraud_patterns WHERE detected_date BETWEEN '2021-08-01' AND '2021-08-31';
SELECT * FROM insurer_claims WHERE policy_number = 12345 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM insurer_claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000 AND policy_number = 54321;
SELECT pattern_description, detected_date FROM fraud_patterns WHERE fraud_level >= 3 ORDER BY fraud_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM insurer_claims WHERE policy_number IN (1001, 2002, 3003) AND claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_claims, SUM(claim_amount) AS total_amount FROM insurer_claims WHERE claim_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Insurer;
SELECT insurer_id, insurer_name FROM Insurer ORDER BY insurer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Claim WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM Claim WHERE claim_amount > 10000 ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM FraudPattern WHERE pattern_description LIKE '%fraud%';
SELECT * FROM Insurer WHERE insurer_id = 1;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_status FROM Claim WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT insurer_name FROM Insurer WHERE insurer_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT Claim.claim_id, Insurer.insurer_name, Claim.claim_date FROM Claim JOIN Insurer ON Claim.insurer_id = Insurer.insurer_id;
SELECT FraudPattern.pattern_description, Claim.claim_amount FROM FraudPattern JOIN Claim ON FraudPattern.claim_id = Claim.claim_id WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM claims_data WHERE claim_id = 1;
SELECT policyholder_name, age FROM policyholders WHERE policy_number = 1001;
SELECT provider_name, location FROM providers WHERE provider_id = 10;
SELECT pattern_description FROM fraud_patterns WHERE pattern_id = 5;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date FROM claims_data WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM claims_data WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT policyholder_name, age FROM policyholders WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT provider_name, location FROM providers WHERE provider_type = 'Hospital' ORDER BY provider_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT pattern_description, risk_level FROM fraud_patterns WHERE risk_level = 'High' ORDER BY pattern_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM claims_data WHERE claim_date <= '2021-10-31' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM claims_data;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM claims_data WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM policy WHERE coverage_type = 'Auto';
SELECT insurer_name, location FROM insurer ORDER BY insurer_name DESC;
SELECT policy_id, insurer_id FROM policy WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM claims_data WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT policy.*, insurer.insurer_name FROM policy JOIN insurer ON policy.insurer_id = insurer.insurer_id WHERE coverage_type = 'Health' AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM claims_data WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY claim_amount ASC;
SELECT policy.* FROM policy LEFT JOIN claims_data ON policy.policy_id = claims_data.policy_id WHERE claims_data.claim_id IS NULL;

SELECT insurer.insurer_name, COUNT(detection_id) AS total_detections FROM insurer JOIN policy ON insurer.insurer_id = policy.insurer_id JOIN fraud_detection ON policy.policy_id = fraud_detection.claim_id GROUP BY insurer.insurer_name HAVING total_detections > 5;
